channel.title: Be kind help me please
channel.description: hey on testscape how do i make my self admin and can any help me how to make commands?

item.title: Be kind help me please
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

Making yourself admin,
Go To characters/YourName.txt
change Player Rights= *
to 0= normal, 1= moderator, 2= admin, 3= staff/owner

Read full topic

item.title: Be kind help me please
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

go into client search for admin listden change name to urs .save and compile.u may not see crown.for command 2secs i on psp net il tell u wen i go on pc in sec[br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2007, 02:29:39 PM[/size][hr]ok… commands search for "saveme in client.java. shuld look sumtin like else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme")) { teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3426; inwildy = false; sendMessage("Pfft"); }
at last } press ENTER and add

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND NAME U TYPE")) { teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; inwildy = false; sendMessage("WOTEVA U WANT MESSAGE TO BE"); }
were ****= coordants wen on moparscape playing ur server press f4 on keyboard den ur see ur coordants so type em in at * den u tele to der…

item commands search for "melee if u cant find it do "barrows under one of em paste in [code] if (command.startsWith(“COMMAND NAME”)) {

			addItem(****,1);
			addItem(****,1);
			addItem(****,1);
			addItem(****,1);
			addItem(****,1);
			addItem(****,1);
			addItem(****,1);
				}[/code] at **** type in da item id.. at 1 tht how many u want
